abstract: Governments are planning a number of measures to aid automakers. Much of that support is meant to accelerate the development of fuel-efficient vehicles.
snippet: Governments are planning a number of measures to aid automakers. Much of that support is meant to accelerate the development of fuel-efficient vehicles.
lead_paragraph: PARIS  Even as the bailout package for Detroit’s automakers remains a question, automakers in Europe and Asia are lining up for handouts.

headline.main: Carmakers in Asia and Europe Also Look for Help
headline.print_headline: Carmakers in Asia and Europe Also Look for Help
